TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit Margins extends System.Object implements class System.ICloneable

summary.span: 指定列印的頁面之邊界的維度。

span.span: Specifies the dimensions of the margins of a printed page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別可用來操作中的邊界的寬度和。The class is used to manipulate the width of margins in and . 為這個類別的類型描述元。 is the type descriptor for this class. ， ，和會定義邊界的屬性。, , , and are properties that define the margins. 建立相同。 creates an identical . 判斷另一個物件是否具有與相同維度。 determines if another object has the same dimensions as a . 如需列印的詳細資訊，請參閱命名空間的概觀。For more information about printing, see the namespace overview. ## Examples 使用， ，和此範例中的命名空間。Use the , , and namespaces for this example. 下列程式碼範例設定預設文件的頁面設定 1 英吋的邊界每一端上。The following code example sets the default page settings for a document to margins of 1 inch on each side. [!code-cpp[Classic Margins Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Margins Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Margins Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Margins Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Margins Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Margins Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定以百分之一英吋為單位的下方邊界。

span.span: Gets or sets the bottom margin, in hundredths of an inch.

value.span: 下方邊界，以百分之一英吋為單位。

span.span: The bottom margin, in hundredths of an inch.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您的量值中公釐邊界，multiply 邊界寬度想要以公釐表示依 3.937 判斷百分之一英吋的正確測量單位。If you measure margins in millimeters, multiply the margin width you want in millimeters by 3.937 to determine the correct measurement in hundredths of an inch. 比方說，如果您想要的 25 公釐邊界，multiply 3.937，結果是 98 時向下捨入。For example, if you want a margin of 25mm, multiply by 3.937 and the result is 98 when rounded down. 接著您會設定適當98 的成員。You would then set the appropriate member to 98. ## Examples 使用， ，和此範例中的命名空間。Use the , , and namespaces for this example. 下列程式碼範例會設定文件的預設頁面設定 1 英吋的寬度，以及上的左右邊界和下邊界 1.5 英吋的寬度。The following code example sets the default page settings for a document to left and right margins of 1 inch in width, and top and bottom margins of 1.5 inches in width. [!code-cpp[Classic Margins.Left Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Margins.Left Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Margins.Left Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Margins.Left Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Margins.Left Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Margins.Left Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您的量值中公釐邊界，multiply 邊界寬度想要以公釐表示依 3.937 判斷百分之一英吋的正確測量單位。If you measure margins in millimeters, multiply the margin width you want in millimeters by 3.937 to determine the correct measurement in hundredths of an inch. 比方說，如果您想要的 25 公釐邊界，multiply 3.937，結果是 98 時向下捨入。For example, if you want a margin of 25mm, multiply by 3.937 and the result is 98 when rounded down. 接著您會設定適當98 的成員。You would then set the appropriate member to 98. ## Examples 使用， ，和此範例中的命名空間。Use the , , and namespaces for this example. 下列程式碼範例會設定文件的預設頁面設定 1 英吋的寬度，以及上的左右邊界和下邊界 1.5 英吋的寬度。The following code example sets the default page settings for a document to left and right margins of 1 inch in width, and top and bottom margins of 1.5 inches in width. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您的量值中公釐邊界，multiply 邊界寬度想要以公釐表示依 3.937 判斷百分之一英吋的正確測量單位。If you measure margins in millimeters, multiply the margin width you want in millimeters by 3.937 to determine the correct measurement in hundredths of an inch. 比方說，如果您想要的 25 公釐邊界，multiply 3.937 和結果已 98 無條件捨去。For example, if you want a margin of 25mm, multiply by 3.937 and the result is 98 rounded down. 接著您會設定適當98 的成員。You would then set the appropriate member to 98. ## Examples 使用， ，和此範例中的命名空間。Use the , , and namespaces for this example. 下列程式碼範例會設定文件的預設頁面設定 1 英吋的寬度，以及上的左右邊界和下邊界 1.5 英吋的寬度。The following code example sets the default page settings for a document to left and right margins of 1 inch in width, and top and bottom margins of 1.5 inches in width.
